summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Real Estate Company (Entreprise Immobilier) features. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed all new features working correctly: Real estate company login, conditional tabs (Locations, + Location, Ventes, + Vendre) visible only for Immobilier sector companies, rental creation form (2 steps), property sale creation form (2 steps), rentals list display, sales list display. Non-immobilier companies correctly do NOT see real estate tabs.
passed_tests: Login entreprise immobilière avec RCCM/GC/IMMO001 / immo123
Login entreprise construction avec RCCM/GC/TEST001 / test123
Affichage des onglets 'Locations', '+ Location', 'Ventes', '+ Vendre' pour entreprise Immobilier
Entreprise non-immobilière (Construction) ne voit pas les onglets immobiliers
API POST /api/company/rentals crée une location (approved Immobilier company)
API POST /api/company/property-sales crée une vente (approved Immobilier company)
API POST /api/company/rentals rejeté pour entreprise non-Immobilier (403)
API POST /api/company/property-sales rejeté pour entreprise non-Immobilier (403)
UI - Création d'une location via formulaire (étape 1 et 2)
UI - Affichage des locations dans la liste avec détails
UI - Formulaire de vente immobilière visible avec types de propriété
UI - Affichage des ventes dans la liste avec détails
seed_data_creation: Real estate company 'Immo Guinea Entreprises' with RCCM/GC/IMMO001 exists and is approved. Has existing rentals and sales for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Real estate company features are fully working. The CompanyDashboard.js conditionally shows real estate tabs (Locations, + Location, Ventes, + Vendre) only when company.sector === 'Immobilier'. The backend endpoints /api/company/rentals and /api/company/property-sales check both verification_status === 'approved' AND sector === 'Immobilier' before allowing creation. The rental form has 2 steps (Informations → Photos), same for sales form. Rentals and sales are displayed in card format with property type, title, description, location, price, and status. Delete functionality works. Public endpoints /api/rentals and /api/property-sales include company listings.
